Uses of Interface
jakarta.validation.spi.ConfigurationState

  • Packages that use ConfigurationState 
    Package Description
    jakarta.validation.spi
    Package containing objects specific to the interaction between the Jakarta Bean Validation bootstrapping process and Jakarta Bean Validation providers.

    • Uses of ConfigurationState in jakarta.validation.spi

      Methods in jakarta.validation.spi with parameters of type ConfigurationState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ValidatorFactory ValidationProvider.buildValidatorFactory(ConfigurationState configurationState)
      Build a ValidatorFactory using the current provider implementation.
